de.lmu.ifi.nm.www

Interface ISatellite

  • All Superinterfaces:
    java.rmi.Remote
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Satellite

    public interface ISatellite
extends java.rmi.Remote
    Java RMI Interface for the Satellite class.
    Since:
    October 2, 2013
    Author:
    Dawin Schmidt, dawin.schmidt@lmu.de

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      org.jgrapht.graph.DirectedWeightedMultigraph<?,?> getTopology()
      Get the site's network topology by asking all available Network Agents to discover the LAN.
      boolean isAlive()
      The TopologyDiscoverer will use this remote method to check whether or not a Satellite is still reachable.
      boolean setRoute(Vertex source, Vertex next, Vertex nextToLast, Vertex destination)
      Set a static route on a network element.

    • Method Detail

      • getTopology

        org.jgrapht.graph.DirectedWeightedMultigraph<?,?> getTopology()
                                                              throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Get the site's network topology by asking all available Network Agents to discover the LAN. The TopologyDiscoverer will call this method while discovering the global network topology.
        Returns:
        The topology graph object of the site's LAN.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - A RemoteException is the common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call.

      • setRoute

        boolean setRoute(Vertex source,
               Vertex next,
               Vertex nextToLast,
               Vertex destination)
                 throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        Set a static route on a network element. The TopologyDiscoverer can call this method.
        Parameters:
        source - - The source network element where to configure the route.
        next - - The neighbor network element for getting the next-hop IP-Address.
        nextToLast - - The second to last network element for calculating the destination network.
        destination - - The destination network element for calculating the destination network.
        Returns:
        True or false whether a route has been placed successfully or not.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - A RemoteException is the common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call.

      • isAlive

        boolean isAlive()
                throws java.rmi.RemoteException
        The TopologyDiscoverer will use this remote method to check whether or not a Satellite is still reachable.
        Returns:
        True or False.
        Throws:
        java.rmi.RemoteException - A RemoteException is the common superclass for a number of communication-related exceptions that may occur during the execution of a remote method call.
